rules_text:
Vigilance
[i]Areadbhar[/i] – When you cast Dimitri, King of Faerghus, exile target creature an opponent controls with power 6 or less.
[i]Paraselene[/i] – Whenever Dimitri deals combat damage to a player, you may return target creature you control to its owner's hand.
[i]Promoted Class[/i] – {1}{W}{U}
